name: A song in the void
description: Imagine a world where music is your last hope. Embark on an extraordinary journey across a strange planet and attempt to uncover its secrets. Discover the history of your people and take control of your destiny.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2,4GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 1050 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
